mapper.select: SELECT g.id,g.goods_name,g.goods_type,g.goods_current_price,g.has_exchange_integral,g.activity_goods_id ,g.goods_integral_price,g.has_mobile_price,g.goods_mobile_price,g.goods_main_photo_path,g.goods_index_photo_path from user_customer_favorites u LEFT JOIN shop_goods g ON u.fid=g.id WHERE u.type=#{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND g.goods_status=0 AND u.uid=#{uid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.update: update shop_goods set goods_collect=goods_collect+1 where id=#{id}
update shop_goods set goods_collect=goods_collect-1 where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) count, goods_status goodsStatus FROM shop_goods WHERE goods_store_id = #{storeId} and delete_status = 0 GROUP BY goods_status
SELECT id FROM shop_goods WHERE goods_status = 0 AND delete_status = 0 AND (is_ygb <> 1 or is_ygb is null)

select g.*, b.`name` brandName , u.`name` userName, store.* from shop_goods g left join shop_goods_brand b on g.goods_brand_id = b.id left join user_manager u on g.user_admin_id = u.uid left join shop_store store ON store.id=g.goods_store_id where g.id=#{id}

select g.id, g.goods_name, g.has_mobile_price, g.goods_mobile_price, g.goods_current_price, g.goods_inventory_detail, goods_inventory, g.goods_main_photo_path, g.goods_current_price, g.goods_price
from shop_goods g where g.goods_status=0 and g.id in
#{id}
ORDER BY g.goods_inventory DESC,g.goods_salenum DESC

SELECT goods_store_id, obj.id, obj.goods_name, obj.goods_current_price, obj.goods_price, obj.goods_main_photo_path, obj.goods_index_photo_path, obj.goods_inventory_detail, obj.inventory_type, obj.goods_type, obj.ex_price_flag, obj.cn_self_add_price, obj.need_money, obj.need_integral, obj.need_ygb, obj.is_ygb FROM shop_goods obj WHERE obj.goods_status = 0 AND obj.delete_status = 0
AND obj.id in
#{goodsId}
ORDER BY obj.add_time DESC
mapper.sql: id, add_time, delete_status, activity_goods_id, activity_status, advance_date, advance_sale_type, bad_evaluate, buy_gift_amount, buy_gift_id, combin_parts_id, combin_status, combin_suit_id, delivery_area, delivery_area_id, description_evaluate, ems_trans_fee, enough_reduce, express_trans_fee, f_sale_type, goods_bottom_format_id, goods_choice_type, goods_click, goods_cod, goods_collect, has_exchange_integral, exchange_integral, goods_integral_price, has_mobile_price, goods_mobile_price, self_add_price, goods_current_price, goods_fee, goods_inventory, goods_name, goods_price, goods_recommend, goods_salenum, goods_seller_time, goods_serial, goods_status, goods_top_format_id, goods_transfee, goods_type, goods_volume, goods_warn_inventory, goods_weight, group_buy, inventory_type, mail_trans_fee, middle_evaluate, mobile_hot, mobile_hotTime, mobile_recommend, mobile_recommendTime, order_enough_give_status, order_enough_if_give, order_enough_reduce_id, price_history, publish_goods_status, qr_img_path, seo_keywords, store_price, store_recommend, store_recommend_time, tax_invoice, warn_inventory_status, well_evaluate, whether_free, ztc_apply_time, ztc_begin_time, ztc_click_num, ztc_dredge_price, ztc_gold, ztc_pay_status, ztc_price, ztc_status, gc_id, goods_brand_id, goods_main_photo_path, goods_index_photo_path, goods_store_id, group_id, transport_id, user_admin_id, ztc_admin_id, evaluate_count, weixin_hot, weixin_hotTime, weixin_recommend, weixin_recommendTime, goods_target, is_ygb, need_ygb, need_money, remark, self_add_price_log, ex_price_flag, cn_self_add_price, need_integral

goods_bottom_format_content, goods_details, goods_f_code, goods_inventory_detail, goods_property, goods_service, goods_top_format_content, pack_details, seo_description, ztc_admin_content, goods_details_mobile

select
distinct
,
from shop_goods
order by ${orderByClause}

distinct
from shop_goods
order by ${orderByClause}

update shop_goods
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
add_time = #{record.addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
delete_status = #{record.deleteStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
activity_goods_id = #{record.activityGoodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
